import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk add models to site"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/models/bulk/site"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds multiple models to sites with specific visibility options.

**Use Cases**
- Mass model deployment across sites
- Site catalog initialization
- Multi-site model synchronization

**Request Format**
Array of EntitySiteOption objects specifying SiteId and IsEnabled for each.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/models/site](/docs/api/models/update-model-site-linking) - Bulk enable/disable
- [POST /api/v1.0/models/\{ModelId\}/site](/docs/api/models/set-model-site-visibility) - Single model

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"EntitySiteOptionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"EntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"EntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"RoleId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"IsDefaultForEntityType":{"type":"boolean"},"Enabled":{"type":"boolean"},"ChildrenEnabledByDefault":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true}},"example":{"EntitySiteOptionId":"f1e2d3c4-b5a6-7890-f1e2-d3c4b5a67890","ProductId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-a1b2-c3d4e5f67890","SiteId":"e5f6a7b8-c9d0-1234-e5f6-a7b8c9d01234","Enabled":true},"title":"EntitySiteOption"}},"example":[{"SiteId":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e","IsEnabled":true},{"SiteId":"cc7dfdf9-f505-f622-b89a-006067cc111f","IsEnabled":true}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
